item.title: By: Hanna Spotzz
item.dc:creator: Hanna Spotzz
item.description: Hilarious! Absolutely believe sh** happens for a reason - found this page while I was looking for pictures of the inside of a 10' moving truck - thank you for posting this story!
item.content:encoded: Hilarious! Absolutely believe sh** happens for a reason – found this page while I was looking for pictures of the inside of a 10′ moving truck – thank you for posting this story!

item.title: By: Tory
item.dc:creator: Tory
item.description: Good luck! Indeed, all the luck in the world. May you have as much good fortune as I did.
item.content:encoded: Good luck! Indeed, all the luck in the world. May you have as much good fortune as I did.

item.title: By: Dennis
item.dc:creator: Dennis
item.description:
Like Liz, I came looking for a picture of a 16-foot truck, and got a great story!
Thankfully, today's move doesn't involve any tight spaces, but we are going 1600 miles from Florida to Minnesota with it...
item.content:encoded:
Like Liz, I came looking for a picture of a 16-foot truck, and got a great story!

Thankfully, today’s move doesn’t involve any tight spaces, but we are going 1600 miles from Florida to Minnesota with it…

item.title: By: Liz
item.dc:creator: Liz
item.description: I ran across your blog while look for pictures of a 16 foot budget truck and I must say that you had an amazing story. Quite frankly I expected that it would end with a date LOL. Kudos!
item.content:encoded: I ran across your blog while look for pictures of a 16 foot budget truck and I must say that you had an amazing story. Quite frankly I expected that it would end with a date LOL. Kudos!

item.description: This is the most awesome of awesome stories.

item.title: By: Tory

item.description: If I was too discomposed to get his last name I was surely in no condition to offer him more than a DDP.

item.title: By: SEESTOR

item.description: I'm with Sarah. One of you should have married him by now.

item.title: By: Glenn
item.dc:creator: Glenn
item.description:
Awesome story. On par with a small Japanese man driving some random Americans around in a tiny Toyota while blasting "Highway to the Danger Zone"
Outstanding Hoke, simply outstanding.
item.content:encoded:
Awesome story. On par with a small Japanese man driving some random Americans around in a tiny Toyota while blasting “Highway to the Danger Zone”

Outstanding Hoke, simply outstanding.

item.title: By: Sarah
item.dc:creator: Sarah
item.description: Proper ladies would have rewarded him with sex. Don't you recognize a future husband when you see one?
